meanings.definition: An opposing or contrary view or opinion.
meanings.sent1: She presented a counterview during the debate.
meanings.sent2: His counterview on the matter sparked a lively discussion.
meanings.sent3: The counterview she shared made everyone rethink their stance.
meanings.sent4: In a counterview to popular belief, she stood firm in her opinion.
meanings.sent5: The counterview was like a splash of cold water, waking everyone up.

meanings.definition: To hold or express an opposing view or opinion.
meanings.sent1: He counterviewed the proposal with valid arguments.
meanings.sent2: They counterview whenever there is a disagreement.
meanings.sent3: She counterviewed playfully, just to tease her friend.
meanings.sent4: His counterview cut through the silence like a sharp knife.
meanings.sent5: Counterviewing boldly, she stood her ground in the debate.
